meanings.definition: To work together in a synergistic manner.
meanings.sent1: The team synergizes to complete the project efficiently.
meanings.sent2: The different departments synergize their skills to achieve success.
meanings.sent3: The robots synergize their functions to clean the house in record time.
meanings.sent4: The music and dance synergize perfectly, creating a mesmerizing performance.
meanings.sent5: The colors synergize to create a beautiful painting that captures the essence of nature.

meanings.definition: To combine efforts for a greater effect.
meanings.sent1: The students synergize their ideas to come up with a creative solution.
meanings.sent2: The athletes synergize their strengths to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients synergize in the recipe to make a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The partnership synergizes the best of both companies, leading to growth.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight and water synergize to help the plants grow strong and healthy.
